name: Jetpack Arena
description:
An idea I have been trying to hatch for a long time. It's a challenge to get something like this optimized while maintaining great collision, hence it being a bit janky. I'm looking for ways to further fix this so expect some updates before and after the end of the jam.

Some things aren't yet implemented but planned to be added over time. May recieve updates even after the jam this is submitted to has concluded as I wish to complete this protoype into a finished game.

Heavily influenced from Worms and Soldat. Using Unity.

Special thanks to:
Prime (some programming & ideas)
Tári (All weapons (art) & ideas)

Bugs:

Client HP has issues with sync
